rules: Rule1: Whenever Organization Alpha has a license for Facility Zeta, it is not the case that Organization Alpha is profitable.
Rule2: Either Organization Alpha has a license for Facility Zeta, or Substance Iota is safe.
Rule3: If Substance Iota passes the stability assay test, then Substance Iota passes the bioavailability assay test.
Rule4: Under the condition that Substance Iota passes the bioavailability assay test, Substance Iota passes the purity assay test.
Rule5: Either Food Product Beta is approved, or Substance Iota is safe.

Rule6: If Food Product Beta is regulated, then if Food Product Beta is a nutraceutical, then if Food Product Beta contains Substance Iota, then if Food Product Beta is approved, Food Product Beta is marketed.
Rule7: Provided that Facility Zeta is inspected, then if it is not the case that whenever Substance Iota is not safe, Substance Iota is contaminated, then Substance Iota is recalled.
Rule8: If Facility Zeta meets GMP standards, then Facility Zeta is inspected.
Rule9: Under the condition that Facility Zeta meets ISO standards, Facility Zeta is inspected.
Rule10: Provided that Facility Zeta is audited by Regulator Delta, then Facility Zeta meets GMP standards.
Rule11: Facility Zeta is audited by Regulator Delta, or Facility Zeta is audited by Auditor Kappa.
Rule12: If Facility Zeta is audited by Auditor Kappa, then Facility Zeta meets ISO standards.
Rule13: Provided that Facility Zeta requires insurance, then Organization Alpha requires insurance.
Rule14: Under the condition that Organization Alpha requires insurance, Financial Product Gamma requires insurance.
Rule15: Either Organization Alpha supplies Substance Iota to Lab Theta, or Organization Alpha supplies Substance Iota to Lab Eta.

Rule16: If Financial Product Gamma trades on Market Omicron, then if Financial Product Gamma is a derivative of Substance Iota, then if Financial Product Gamma requires insurance, Substance Iota requires insurance.
Rule17: Organization Alpha has debt, or if Organization Alpha has a license for Facility Zeta, then Organization Alpha is profitable.

Rule18: Under the condition that Facility Zeta receives a warning, then if it is not the case that whenever it is not the case that whenever Substance Iota is not safe, Substance Iota is contaminated, then Substance Iota is recalled, then Facility Zeta is shut down.
Rule19: Facility Zeta receives a warning, or Facility Zeta receives a fine.

Rule20: Provided that Facility Zeta receives a fine, then if it is not the case that whenever it is not the case that whenever Substance Iota is not safe, Substance Iota is contaminated, then Substance Iota is recalled, then Facility Zeta is shut down.
Rule21: Provided that Facility Zeta creates a job for a chemist, then Facility Zeta creates a job for an analyst.
Rule22: Either Facility Zeta creates a job for a chemist, or Facility Zeta creates a job for a technician.
Rule23: Under the condition that Facility Zeta creates a job for a technician, Facility Zeta meets ISO standards.
Rule24: Provided that Organization Alpha supplies Substance Iota to Lab Eta, then it is not the case that Organization Alpha has a license for Facility Zeta.
Rule25: Provided that Organization Alpha breaches an agreement, then Organization Alpha violates a contract.
Rule26: Facility Zeta is certified, or Facility Zeta is accredited.
Rule27: If Facility Zeta is accredited, then either Facility Zeta meets GMP standards, or Facility Zeta meets ISO standards.
Rule28: Either Facility Zeta is awarded the quality prize, or Facility Zeta is awarded the safety prize.
Rule29: If Facility Zeta is awarded the safety prize, then if Facility Zeta is certified, then either Facility Zeta meets GMP standards, or Facility Zeta meets ISO standards.
Rule30: Organization Alpha has funding from a government grant, or if Organization Alpha supplies Substance Iota to Lab Theta, then Organization Alpha produces Substance Iota.
Rule31: If Lab Eta tests Substance Iota, then if Lab Theta tests Substance Iota, then Substance Iota is safe.
Rule32: Under the condition that Substance Iota passes the purity assay test, then if Lab Theta tests Substance Iota, then Substance Iota is safe.
Rule33: Provided that Substance Iota passes the toxicity assay test, then Lab Eta tests Substance Iota.
Rule34: Either Substance Iota passes the toxicity assay test, or Substance Iota passes the stability assay test.

Rule35: Provided that it is not the case that if Food Product Beta is a nutraceutical, then if Food Product Beta contains Substance Iota, then if Food Product Beta is approved, Food Product Beta is marketed, then it is not the case that Organization Alpha faces a penalty.
Rule36: If it is not the case that if Facility Zeta creates a job for an analyst, then Facility Zeta meets GMP standards, then Organization Alpha breaches an agreement.

Rule37: Provided that it is not the case that if Facility Zeta is awarded the quality prize, then if Facility Zeta is certified, then either Facility Zeta meets GMP standards, or Facility Zeta meets ISO standards, then Facility Zeta loses certification.

Rule38: If it is not the case that whenever it is not the case that if Food Product Beta is a nutraceutical, then if Food Product Beta contains Substance Iota, then if Food Product Beta is approved, Food Product Beta is marketed, then Organization Alpha faces a penalty, then Organization Alpha faces a lawsuit.

Rule39: Provided that it is not the case that whenever it is not the case that if Food Product Beta is a nutraceutical, then if Food Product Beta contains Substance Iota, then if Food Product Beta is approved, Food Product Beta is marketed, then Organization Alpha faces a penalty, then it is not the case that Organization Alpha faces a lawsuit.

Rule40: Under the condition that it is not the case that whenever it is not the case that if Facility Zeta is awarded the quality prize, then if Facility Zeta is certified, then either Facility Zeta meets GMP standards, or Facility Zeta meets ISO standards, then it is not the case that Facility Zeta loses certification, then Facility Zeta gains oversight.

Rule41: Provided that it is not the case that whenever it is not the case that if Facility Zeta is awarded the quality prize, then if Facility Zeta is certified, then either Facility Zeta meets GMP standards, or Facility Zeta meets ISO standards, then it is not the case that Facility Zeta loses certification, then it is not the case that Facility Zeta gains oversight.
Rule42: Under the condition that it is not the case that whenever Substance Iota is not safe, Substance Iota is contaminated, then it is not the case that Substance Iota is recalled.
Rule43: Provided that it is not the case that whenever Substance Iota is not safe, it is not the case that Substance Iota is hazardous, then Facility Zeta requires insurance.

Rule44: Under the condition that it is not the case that whenever Substance Iota is not safe, it is not the case that Substance Iota is hazardous, then it is not the case that Substance Iota requires insurance.
Rule45: Provided that Substance Iota is not safe, then Substance Iota is hazardous.
Rule46: Under the condition that Substance Iota is not safe, then it is not the case that Substance Iota is contaminated.
facts: Fact1: Food Product Beta contains Substance Iota.
Fact2: Food Product Beta is a nutraceutical.
Fact3: Food Product Beta is regulated.
Fact4: Financial Product Gamma is a derivative of Substance Iota.
Fact5: Financial Product Gamma trades on Market Omicron.
Fact6: Lab Theta tests Substance Iota.
Fact7: Food Product Beta is not marketed.
Fact8: Organization Alpha does not produce Substance Iota.
Fact9: Organization Alpha does not have debt.
Fact10: Facility Zeta is not shut down.
Fact11: Organization Alpha does not violate a contract.
Fact12: Organization Alpha does not have funding from a government grant.
